about_the_game:
Once upon a time, an orphan named Mary was left on the door step of a humble mouse family's home. She was raised as a mouse, but one fateful day she met the mysterious Edgar, who changed her life forever. This is a love story of Mary and her first love.

This visual novel is a very personal story that Sonya has written, based on her own childhood, and how she grew up into the person she is today. It details similar events in Sonya's life when she was young, what she has seen and learned, and how it molded her into the person she is now.

Features

  • 2 Endings
  • Stunning artwork
  • Breathtaking music
  • Sonya's writing
  • Rated : E10+

Note: This was the last game to be ever made with the website, and the last game Sonya saved before the website shut down on May 29th, 2024.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains extreme graphical and textual violence that may be inappropriate for anyone under 13. It contains scenes of murder and killing by a snake that is eating prey, similar to violence seen in nature documentaries of wild animals.

This particular game does not contain any sexual acts, as this is a story about Sonya's childhood, not when she is an adult.
